transcript:
Customer: Hari anant hari katha ananta.
Halo.
Executive: Hanji Shivam ji.
Customer: Hanji sir bataiye.
Executive: Ji ji mai keh raha tha kal hamari jo form chali hai palak enterprise apni meerut se actually sir hamara discussion ho nahi paya tha properly. To jo main uske sath discussion kar raha tha jaise sir hamari jo profile hai CCTV ke liye camera isme added hai LED flower light hai wall hanging hai. Flower borders hai plastic flower pot hai LED heart light hai diwali toran aur LED candler.
Customer: Ab
Executive: Achha bataiye sir isme basically hum connect kar rahe hain buyers ko jaise yaha pe IndiaMART basically aapko teen char tarike se inquiry option deti hai connect karne ke liye ki buylead se hum connect kar lete hain buyer directly aapki profile pe jaake message karta hai aur calls ke through aapko approach karta hai hai na. Right to basically aap bataiye sir isme kaha pe dikkat vagera hame aa rahi hai kyuki mai dekh raha tha ki leads vagera pe to matlab na ke barabar hi connect ho raha hai to buyer aa raha hai calls ke through ya jo directly message kar raha hai aapke portfolio pe bas wohi buyers se hamara approach ho pa raha hai cheezo ko leke. To isme batao sir kaise aapko help out kar sakta hu cheezo ko kaha pe kya problem aa rahi kaha pe hamara support chahiye woh batao aap mere ko.
Customer: Sir dekho jo matlab ye buylead hoti hai na. Ye consume karni hoti hai.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Ye hame continuous di thi pehle. Lekin 1% ka bhi conversion nahi aaya tha.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: 1% ka bhi. Bas isiliye dekho pehle maine proper time diya ise koi damage isme aaya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ab dekho maine time bhi lena chhod diya ise mai jaha se mujhe business aa raha hai mai waha pe time de raha hu.
Executive: Sir bilkul aapki baat sahi hai lekin mai aapko ek aur cheez batata hu sir dekho buylead se sirf buylead hi nahi buylead se do cheeze matters hoti hai buylead se ek to jis product me aap focus karte ho woh product aapka ek focused area me aata hai ki aap is product me focus kar rahe ho is areas me focus kar rahe ho to uske base pe kya hota hai sir us product me aapki ek listing better hoti hai aur jiski wajah se jo inquiry aur calls ka ratio hai woh improve hota hai. Ab jaise mai ek normal aapka product leta hu jo aapka mera jiska bhi sir apna beta connections kara hai ek hanging candler ka kiya hai crystal candler ka kiya hai theek hai sir. Agar mai iska normally meerut ke andar agar apne services ko dekhu theek hai aur mai apna isme apna customer dhundu ki bhai meri jo company hai meerut me kon kon customers mere paas baitha hua hai is hisab se.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To lagbhag lagbhag sir is samay meerut me mere paas ye mano lagbhag 15-20 suppliers hai jo is product me baithe hai bare minimum jyada hi honge usme.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Hai na bilkul jaise abhi hamari ek company sir aap unko jaante hi ho meerut cant ki hai S.S. enterprise. Ek apne fuldan ki hai rehman handicraft. Ek suraj handicraft ek apne C.S. enterprise hai ek hum khud hai ek chaman handicraft hai manish enterprise hai lahoriya collection hai ayan yusuf handicraft matlab bahut sare hain is tarike se.
Customer: Bahut sare hain.
Executive: Bilkul bahut sare mil jayenge aapko line se to basically sir kya hai jitne bhi aapke wale package ke honge aapke upar ke honge to basically kya hai focused area rehta hai ki aap jaise aap leads se connect karte ho na ek to kuch hoga sir jo buyer mana karega obviously baat hai kuch reply nahi karte hain kuch bolte hain haan bhai batate hain ab aapko karke ek hota hai uske base pe aapki jo listings generate hoti hai na jiske base pe footfall aapke portfolio pe aata hai to direct inquiry calls ka ratio badhta hai aur isi ko hi thoda sa sort out karne ke liye humne ab kya kiya hai na sir aapne ek cheez analyze kari hogi jis me aap jaise registered ho ab tak ab maximum inquiries me na hum ki buyer ne aap se inquiry dalne ke sath sath 24 ghante me abhi tak kon kon se products me aur search kiya hai IndiaMART se woh dikhate hain sath me buyer ne kitni bar inquiry post kari hai abhi tak ya kitni bar reply kara hai agar kisi ka GST hai to GST registered hai to GST dikhate hain so that usse aap us buyer ko connect karne se pehle aapko thoda sa ek idea lag jaye ki haan bhai isme customers ko mai connect karu haan ye mere liye fruitful ho sakta hai cheezo ko leke. Hai na is tarike se sir aapne analyze kiya hoga hai na bilkul to woh cheez hum month on month isi cheez ko hi aapke cheezo ko badha isi me jaise abhi sir ek inquiry aayi hai aapke paas ek aayi hai mogra artificial flower ki 24 minute pehle aayi hai meerut ki hai ab usse kya hai quantities buyer ne likha hai 500 piece color white why do you need it reselling purpose ke liye order frequency weekly chahiye ki sample required yes delivery required yes flower type cameli ha camela chahiye inko ha primary material plastic chahiye uske sath sath us buyer ne kya search kara hai plastic mogra artificial flower white wedding ke liye white plastic rajnigandha artificial flower ya half brown pearl beads search isne aur kari hai to hum ye options aapko dikhate hain buyer kab se member hai char saal se hai hamara kya woh purchase karta hai humse wooden jewelry box kiya hai abhi tak usne earphone kiya hai fabric laser cutting services ki hai requirement 62 bar dali hai uska GST hai whatsapp hai agar is tarike se sari cheeze to so that usse ye hai kuch dekho le bhi sakta hai woh nahi bhi lekin at least ye hai ki itni sari cheeze woh hame agar detailing me de raha hai to ek mere customers ko usse connect karne se pehle ek option mil jata hai ki haan bhai ye itni sari cheeze hain to customer genuine ho sakta hai cheezo ko leke right to ye sari cheeze hum isme mention kar rahe hain buylead ko sir chhodo mat ab mai ye bhi nahi kahunga sir jaha pe aapko achha mil raha hai ki waha pe time nahi dena waha pe aapko time dena chahiye kyuki aap businessman ho sir jaha se dhandha nikalega sir waha pe focus aur jyada jayega right na shivam bhai usi tarike se kam karte hain isme na segregation aap kar paoge subah jaise aap apna office vagera open karte ho to apna waha pe apna cheezo ko karo dusri dopahar me apna connect kar liya sham me apna kar liya notification apne on rakho to jaise koi inquiry ya kuch bhi aati hai aapke paas turant ek notification aa jaye jaise aap usko press karo aapke paas turant aap dekh ke ek bar application open karke apna dekh lo to abhi IndiaMART ko jaise abhi tak use kar rahe the aap woh basically kaise kar rahe the laptop se ya mobile se.
Customer: Mobile se bhi aur apne system se PC se.
Executive: Achha mobile se laptop se dekho sir laptop se dekho possible nahi hai shivam ji ko aap hamesha apne sath carry kar sakte ho right aap bhi samajhte ho hai na mobile pe apna notification vagera apna on karke rakho jaise koi aati hai notice cheeze woh aapko turant notification dikhaye aur check karke apna purchase karo. Dusri cheez apna ye option rakho ki bhai sahab jitni bhi ye aa rahi hai cheeze buyers se aapka connect hota hai ya calls ke through ya direct inquiry ke through un buyer ko reviews ke liye thoda sa bolo. Ab mai reviews ke liye sir kyu bol raha hu jaise sir aap facebook pe ho right aapne bataya instagram pe ho ya aapne normally agar mesho pe dal rakha hoga product apna amazon vagera pe bhi agar dala ho aapne to sir aapne ek cheez dekha hoga jaise amazon pe do series pe aate hain amazon ka ek to prime seller ek normal seller aur jo bhi prime seller me koi bhi agar aap inquiry bhejte ho koi bhi search karte ho sir waha pe na ek options aata hai ki us buyer ko kitna reviews mila hua hai hai na sir to hum us reviews ko dekh ke thoda sa hamara na trust build up ho jata hai us buyer ke liye ki haan bhai chalo iske paas itne buyer ne review diya hai means ye genuine customer hai padhte hain usko fir aage karte hain to jitna aapka reviews badhega na sir utni opportunity aur jyada generate hogi kyu bol raha hu sir aap normally na kuch mat kariyega google pe apne crystal candler dal ke dekhiyega meerut me aapko jaise mai S.S. enterprise ki baat bata raha hu aapke upar wale plan pe no doubt lekin bhi inke paas abhi tak kam hi buyer ne diya hai lekin inko 29 buyer ne review de rakhe hain 4.1 ki rating hai dusre hain rehman handicraft unko 23 buyer ne review de rakha hai 4.5 ki rating hai to matlab ye sari cheeze na thoda sa buyer dekhta hai cheezo ko jaise aap khud bhi dekhoge agar aap aise buyer jaoge aap bhi dekhoge jaise company hai apni meerut ki royal enterprise kesarganj ki unko 90 buyer ne review de rakhe hain to apna ye bolo kyuki dekho hota sir ye hai na char se bologe tab jaake ek buyer deta hai.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Hai na hai na char panch se bologe tab sare ke sare nahi dete sir hum bhi agar zomato se kuch khana manga le flipkart wala delivery boy wala bhi aake bolta hai sir bhai ji review de dijiyega man aaya to de diya man nahi aaya to nahi diya right na woh options hota hai to apne yaha pe to ab hai na yaha pe to sir apne dhandhe ke liye baat kar rahe ho to kehne me to sharm hai nahi kisi cheez ki bhaiya dega to sir achha aapke portfolio pe dikhegi woh cheez sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Hai na dusra abhi jaise sir mera yaha pe ab mere ko isme batao jo abhi aapke products aa rahe hain abhi aap kis product pe sabse jyada focus kar rahe ho CCTV camera me ya isme candler vagera me kar rahe ho.
Customer: Mera dekho handicraft hi hai maine to.
Executive: Handicraft ka bhi kar rahe ho aap ek second ruko handicraft me apne kon kon se aa gaye apne ye light ka hai planted stand set hai apna theek hai ab jaise sir ye hai home decorative ceramic flower vase hai na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ab mere ko sir isme bataiye agar aap se meri baat ab ho gayi hai ab mere ko ek cheez bataiye sir aapke ek do teen char panch products aise hain sir jo na new item me dala hua hai ye bilkul buyer ko alag dikh raha hoga CCTV ke specifically camera me saat products hain CCTV camera me dala hua hai LED flower light ke panch products hai us category me humne dala hua hai flower border ke do products hai alag dala hua hai LED candler ke alag products hai do alag me alag dal rakhe hain toran ke alag kar rakhe hain heart light ke alag kar rakhe hain ab ye products hain jaise home decorative ceramic flower vase iski mai ek alag hi category bana du na sir plastic flower pots me sir kam nahi karega hai na.
Customer: Ji ji aap bana do apne tarike se edit kar do koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai CCTV plus wifi camera mera hai side even lotus ugly brass bowl hai apna theek hai stage per candlers hai crystal hanging candlers hai theek hai in char ki mai alag alag category bana de raha hu sir ye bhi aadhe ghante me aap dekh bhi lijiyega aapke portfolio pe dikh jayega dusra sir na leads vagera pe na daily basis pe na ye banao sir do do teen teen leads apni shivam bhai call karo theek hai aur mai aapko sir monday tuesday dobara se call karunga mujhe un leads vagera pe direct inquiry ka jo feedback aayega woh mere ko batana dobara se aur koshish ye karunga sir tuesday na aapke sath video meeting bhi ek bar karu thoda sa na portfolio pe kya kya aur modification kar sakta hu aapki help ke bina kyuki dekho aap jo apne products ko aap se behtar to dekho koi nahi jaanta ki aap kis tarike se buyer ko kya samajhte ho kis tarike se karte ho right mai IndiaMART ke base pe us cheez ko modification kar sakta hu lekin aapki guidance to chahiye hi chahiye kyuki aap ground level pe buyer ke sath deal karte ho products ke.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Right na sir hai na to monday ya tuesday mai aapke sath ek video meeting bhi karunga theek hai aap bata dijiyega mere ko time kis time aapke liye convenient rahega pehle half me ya second half me us hisab se mai update karwa dunga filhal mai aapki char categories ko save karwa deta hu ek bar.
Customer: Theek hai karwa do.
Executive: Achha isme aisa kuch hota hai kya matlab jaise koi humse higher plan leta hai to unhe kuch achhe genuine customer dena ya jaise mera kam ka hai hume thoda kuch lower level ke customer dena.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi mai aapko clear kar deta hu cheeze koi bhi bade plan pe aap jaata hai na mera koi bhi customers theek hai sirf direct inquiry calls ka ratio badhta hai uska direct inquiry calls ka ratio buylead jaise abhi aap purchase kar rahe ho woh bhi usi tarike se purchase karte hain sirf aapka jo scope hai purchase karne ka woh limit badh jati hai jaise abhi aapke wale plan me aap 17 buyer se connect kar sakte ho trust seal me aap 34 buyer se kar sakte ho website website wale plan pe jaate ho to aap lagbhag 44 se kar sakte ho aur aur koi city wise agar aapko promote karna hai to alag alag plan hai 72 buyer se kar sakte ho lekin condition ek hi hai ek inquiry ko sirf panch hi supplier purchase kar sakte hain agar aapne panchve number pe purchase kar liya uske baad se mere 15 lakh wala customer bhi us inquiry ko purchase karne ja raha hoga to woh purchase nahi kar payega waha pe aa jayega that inquiry has been sold out you are not liable to purchase that inquiry sirf mera koi bhi customer jo increase karta hai apni listing ko sirf apna plan promotion ke liye buyer ka trust build up karne ke liye aur jyada se jyada inquiry calls ke through jo organic wali aapki listing hoti hai uske through woh mere paas jyada se aaye kyuki usme listing thodi si aapki increase ho jati hai listing increase ho jati hai kaise sir ki man ke chaliye mera jo plan hai jo higher listing wala thoda sa pehle dikh gaya aap agar dusre page pe dikh rahe ho woh pehle page pe dikh jayega agar aap 500 me compete kar rahe ho woh kahi agar 100 200 me compete kar raha hai to uske buyer thoda sa unse pehle pahunch jata hai calls ke through bas itna fark aata hai.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads from IndiaMART.

- Low conversion rate from buyleads.

- Wants to know how to improve lead quality.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to improve lead quality.

- Suggested focusing on specific products.

- Suggested asking buyers for reviews.

- Will create separate categories for products.

- Will call again to get feedback on leads.

- Will schedule a video meeting to discuss portfolio.

- Clarified that higher plans do not guarantee better customers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call again on Monday/Tuesday.

- Video meeting to be scheduled.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, reviews, product listing
